SELECT pom.id,pom.company_s_name,pom.platform_service_provider,pom.payment_inventory,pom.acceptance_certificate, pom.many_payment,pom.payment_order_status,pom.payment_date,t.task_code,t.task_name,t.release_date,t.deadline_date,t.industry_type from tb_payment_order_many pom LEFT JOIN tb_task t ON t.id=pom.task_id WHERE pom.id=#{payId}

SELECT pi.id,pi.worker_name,pi.mobile_code,pi.id_card_code,pi.bank_code,pi.real_money,pi.task_money,pom.tax_id,pom.recevice_tax FROM tb_payment_order_many pom LEFT JOIN tb_payment_inventory pi ON pi.payment_order_id=pom.id WHERE pom.id=#{payId}
SELECT m.company_name,ci.credit_code,ci.company_address,ci.telephones,ci.bank_name,ci.bank_code FROM tb_merchant as m LEFT JOIN tb_company_info as ci ON m.company_id=ci.id WHERE m.id=#{id}

SELECT pi.id,pi.worker_id,pi.worker_name,pi.mobile_code,pi.id_card_code,pi.bank_code,pi.real_money,pi.task_money,pi.tax_rate,pi.tax_amount,pom.recevice_tax from tb_crowd_sourcing_invoice csi LEFT JOIN tb_payment_inventory pi ON pi.payment_order_id=csi.payment_order_many_id LEFT JOIN tb_payment_order_many pom ON pom.id=csi.payment_order_many_id WHERE csi.id=#{invoiceId}
